name: Wolfgang Schulte
company_name: Granny Flats and Timber Garden Cabins
note:
lead from Australia
https://www.linkedin.com/in/wolfgang-schulte-9981ba89

Thanks for connecting.
What sort of lead generation services and content management do you offer?

user.name: Granny Flats and Timber Garden Cabins

need_candidates.comment_requirements:
We are not in the B2B space but B2C. we generate Leads through Google adds and Facebook

What I’d need help with:
- Potential live chat on our website for 4 hours a day during the peak traffic times and then up these hours. 
- as leads are created we need help with customised follow up emails, text messaging, with the goal to book a Granny Flat consultation.
- specific work: from a customers address checking council online mapping tool for town planning. We have the process for this. From this generation of a standard report which needs to be sent to the customer.

This is basically the process from a lead to an MQL, to an SQL .

client_detail.name: Wolfgang Schulte

employment_statuses.name: Part Time
employment_statuses.description: (80 hours) 5 days per week,  4 hours per day

need_candidates.comment_requirements:
Responsibilities:
Writing a blog post twice a month 
Create and send out a newsletter 
Edit existing materials (videos, photos) and post them on social media
Publish social ads on FB
Respond to customer queries on a  live chat during busy hours (4-8pm Australian time) 
Call qualified leads

name: Chris Cook Q.F.P.
note:
Yes - marketing services
May we have an inital call/Zoom on Friday? Thank you

Chris@chantry.email
And
Paul@chantry.email
3.30pm?

Result:
Company Name: Chantry Group
Company Website: http://www.chantry.group
Contact Person: Chris Cook
Product:  The Chantry Group provides franchise marketing, franchisee recruitment and franchise resales services, delivered by a team of QFPs and always tailored to individual business needs.  
From game plan to Google and from filtering to final interview, they can help you attract and engage the people you want and need in your network. They use an evidence-based approach, combining our knowhow and experience with yours - because the best results come from pooling our strengths.
Country-Location: UK
Target Audience: UK
Immediate Requirement: Marketing Services, Strategist, People who can work with Web Design, Delivery of the service. He wants people for a long term. He needs to think about our proposition.
Next Step: send him a presentation, website.
Next Contact Date: keep in touch by email. It will be one more call with Paul.

Result:

Company Name: Chantry Group

Company Website: http://www.chantry.group

Contact Person: Paul Stafford

Product:  The Chantry Group provides franchise marketing, franchisee recruitment and franchise resales services, delivered by a team of QFPs and always tailored to individual business needs. 

From game plan to Google and from filtering to final interview, they can help us attract and engage the people we want and need in our network. They use an evidence-based approach, combining their knowhow and experience with ours - because the best results come from pooling their strengths.

They are passionate about great service, integrity, honesty, and maximising results for their budget. 

Country-Location: UK

Target Audience: worldwide

Immediate Requirement: He wants candidates with a really good English. He needs to think about our proposition and services and to talk with Chris - owner. 

Next Step: send a presentation.

Next Contact Date: keep in touch by email.

Manager: Anna V.

We interviewed candidates for the CHANTRY GROUP company.

Candidates:

Vadym https://rh-s.com/marketer/ppc-managers/vadym-b/
Worked as a Sales Manager, Product Manager. Passed PPC and SEO courses. He knows how to do Chat Bot, Google Ads, FB Ads, Instagram Ads. 

Oksana https://rh-s.com/marketer/content-managers/oksana-m/
Worked as SMM manager, FB Ads specialist.

We talked with Esther Boughton, she is Franchise Growth Specialist.

Ester needs to discuss all information with colleagues and the CEO and she will come back to us as soon as she has the results.

Result:
Company Name: Trillo Inc. 
Company Website: https://www.trillo.io/
Contact Person: Anil Sharma
Product:  Trillo is an AI-Driven application platform for developing enterprise-class applications. It's Natural Language Processing capabilities vastly simplify and accelerate application delivery. Trillo provides integration with an extensive ecosystem of cloud services from GCP, AWS, & Azure. It is a low-code offering and eliminates DevOps.
Trillo is a provider of a no-code/low-code application platform. Trillo Apps, its flagship platform for building AI/ML (vision, NLP, data analytics, unstructured document processing) enabled applications on GCP.
Country-Location: United States
Target Audience: North America, Europ, India.
Immediate Requirement: Mostly he works with google. He searches for people who can work with social media (Facebook, Instagram). He needs someone who can help them to promote their company. He needs Marketing managers, Lead managers, Content managers. 
Next Step: send CVs of the most suitable candidates and all necessary information. 
Next Contact Date: keep in touch by email.

But, unfortunately, the client doesn't relevant to us. He is from India.

need_candidates.comment_requirements:
Ben Sinclair  
Hey Iryna,
We are looking to take on a recruiter on a commission basis that has experience in Healthcare sector specifically General Practitioners/Doctor, ideally once they have made a placement and proved they're good enough we would take them on our books and pay them a monthly salary, is this something you can offer?
Ben Sinclair  
Hey,
Thank you for your response on this.
Ideally we would like to hire someone on a commission basis, as soon as they have completed their first placement with us they will then be fully employed and paid a monthly salary.
If you can find someone willing to do this we would be interested in pursuing.
Ben

name: Gareth Byrne
note:
Company Name: AdSpark Digital
Company Website: http://www.adsparkdigital.com/
Contact Person: Gareth Byrne  
Product:   They do not charge any setup fees, and they do not sign you up to a complicated monthly retainer style contract without any guarantee of ROI for your business. 
How They Work:
They ask how much your business earns from a converted lead. They ask how good you are at converting leads and work out a conversion percentage. For example, if your team is given 100 great quality leads how many will you close.
So if you're a business owner that needs leads at scale and you are a B2C type business and you have a call center then they can seriously blow things up.
Country-Location: Ireland
Target Audience: worldwide
Immediate Requirement: He needs a  content manager, who can create ads, generate leads. Someone, who manages to complain in google, who can work with video creating for youtube. Also he asked for a copywriting person, designers, Media buyers, PPC, Social managers.  He doesn't need to work full-time, (10 hours per week)
Next Step: send CVs of the most suitable candidates and all necessary information. Send a price. Send a website.
Next Contact Date: keep in touch by email.

Gareth Byrne   (https://www.linkedin.com/in/garethbyrnepayperlead/) runs a pay per lead agency. He needs different skill sets for different jobs but not on a full-time basis. He received a list of specialties and wants to see if we can find a fit for him.

name: Nicholas Baingo
note:
Company Name: Vumami Foods
Company Website: https://vumamifoods.com/
Contact Person: Nicholas Baingo
Product:
 Vumami Foods is a vegan food company that makes delicious products that add deep umami flavour and richness to any dish. Their famous (at least locally famous) Umami Bomb Shiitake Chili Oil is available online and at stores and markets throughout BC. 
Country-Location: Canada
Target Audience: USA
Immediate Requirement: Nicholas asked about Ad Design, Content writers (SEO, SMM, keywords). Somebody, who can manage a campaign. We need to try to find a candidate who is available to work his time. 
Next Step: send all information about our company and CV`s of the most suitable candidates and next call will be next week.

name: Maurits Kvåle
note:
Thanks for reaching out Ulianna. That sounds a bit too cheap, doesn't it? It is important for me that people we work with are well treated, and not underpaid for the work they do.

But, I am curious about how we can expand our marketing, so I'd be happy to have a video meeting and hear about what you do. ????

Result:
Company Name: Lean Communications AS
Company Website: http://www.leancommunications.no
Contact Person: Maurits Kvåle
Product:  Lean Communications is a consulting company that specializes in training and implementation of Lean philosophy. Lean is not a collection of tools, it is a solid philosophy that aims to deliver flawless products and services by producing value for the customer and making it as efficient as possible. Lean is simply about the search for perfection
Specialties: Lean, Consulting, Six Sigma, Construction, Production, and Change Management
Country-Location: Norway
Target Audience: Norway
Immediate Requirement: Maurits do not say what exactly he is looking for. He will think about our products and come back to us. At the moment he does not have any concrete needs. 
Next Step: send all information about our company. 
Next Contact Date: keep in touch by email
